Text:
Thanks for the up!
Does anyone know where I can get issue #2 & & #3 of the NEW GI Joe (volume 3)? They've been out but I've yet to see  them for BT download. Also, Two other NEW G.I. Joe Titles I haven't been able to find - "GI Joe: Special Missions", and "GI Joe: Cobra Files". Both are BRAND NEW titles that debuted with GI Joe Vol. 3. Thanks

dawg44, honestly i was so disappointed by the art & dialogue in #1 that i've been passing up all of those.

but hey, here ya go:
